t: Amazon Global Store Terms & Conditions - Amazon Customer Service
s: When purchasing International Products, you acknowledge that the sale occurs outside of the U.S. and that you are importing the products for your personal use, which will be reflected on customs documentation. You will be listed as the importer of record for customs purposes.

t: International Shipping Terms & Conditions - Amazon Customer Service
s: When ordering from Amazon.co.uk, you must comply with all applicable laws and regulations of the destination to which your products are being delivered ("destination"). You are also responsible for assuring that your products may be lawfully imported into the country of importation.
